title: MINI SHOW #1: Kamala Harris Disapproval, Nabisco Workers Strike, and Alex Jones Rips Trump

itunes:title: MINI SHOW #1: Kamala Harris Disapproval, Nabisco Workers Strike, and Alex Jones Rips Trump
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar have compiled their weekend YouTube segments into a mini podcast. In this mini show, they discuss Kamala Harris's terrible polling, Nabisco workers striking across the country, and Alex Jones criticizing Trump for supporting the covid vaccine.
